extendedInfo.description: Home networking just got easier. When connected to your home Wi-Fi, use the Cisco Connect Express App to add devices to your network, manage guest access, and change Wi-Fi and router information. Now Linksys E-Series, X-Series and Valet router users can have their real-time network information at their fingertips from anywhere in the home.Key Features: Guest access â An easy way for visitors to get online. Give password-protected Internet access to visiting friends and family while keeping your own information private. No need to remember the guest password, itâs in the app. Simply email the password to your guest and theyâll be online in no time. Add devices to your network â Quickly connect your computers, gaming consoles, tablets, and other Wi-Fi enabled devices to your network. You can add them manually, or with Wi-Fi Protected Setupâ¢ if your device supports it. Access Wi-Fi settings â Access your network name and password at anytime from anywhere in your home. If you need your password to add a device manually, quickly access it via your app. Access router features â Keep your router up-to-date. Check for firmware updates and view details about your router, including model name and number, serial number, firmware version, and more. Plus, easily get a new WAN IP address or reboot your router. Disclaimer: An active, customer purchased Internet Service Provider broadband account is required for connection of your router and other connected computers and devices to the Internet. System Requirements: â¢ This product will only work with a Linksys EA-Series, E-Series, X-Series or Valet home router. To view the full list of supported routers, click here: http://home.cisco.com/mobile/apps/supported â¢ Requires an active Wi-Fi connection to your Linksys E-Series, X-Series or Valet home router.â¢ Android 2.2.1 or greater

reviews.title: One Problem
reviews.comment: My Cisco isn\'t my DHCP server and the app doesn\'t recognize the device on the network even though I\'m connected to the Cisco. Please fix in update? Allow for multiple Cisco devices?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all!
reviews.comment: App will not connect to my router. I have both the Linksys and Sysco app and neither work. One says incorrect password and the other says the router is offline.
reviews.author: Ted Seeley

reviews.title: Does not work for me
reviews.comment: I have an E4200v2 which Cisco says is a supported device. I was able to log in with the Linksys smart WiFi app several versions ago but not anymore. Says router offline but I know its online. Please help!
reviews.author: Daniel Kitchens

reviews.title: More features needed
reviews.comment: As a parent I want to control through an app my children\'s internet access. Each child has a school laptop, iTouch, phone plus access to a play station / wii. That\'s more than the E4200 router can handle in Parent Controls. I need away to group each childs devices under their name and then group the children into a kids group. Come meal time or house jobs/ homework not completed, I want to block on demand the Kids group or the individual  from internet access (skype, games, facebook etc) or in the reverse, if one of the children needs to work on a project, extend the access time just for that day.  Please Cisco lets do this right and make a really useful app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Good App. Does what it says. I like it because I can keep track of  the amount of devices on my router and can allow a guest on my network via app. Like others, I feel too it could do more, but it\'s free!!!!!
reviews.author: sammy atkins

reviews.title: Crap if not using there router
reviews.comment: If you happen to use a router made by someone else ,your out of luck , been using for many years now I have to buy. Some Cisco router tu.   It !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: My device is not supported E900, actually I was going to buy the dlink cloud d605L; because the smartphone phones features integration, now i feel down having my linksys unsupported i wish they add my device.
reviews.author: Jawdat Higab

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: High quality app, but it could use more admin functions. Remote WPS is a great feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs parental control!
reviews.comment: The PC version has very limited control.. It\'s sad to see this has none at all. Would be great to set times of day when Internet usage is limited. PLZ ADD THIS FEATURE
reviews.author: Phil Browne

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: It is good to be able to view who is on my network but I would like to be able change my passwords easily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too simple
reviews.comment: Not enough advanced options,  was waiting on this app for a while :-(, was expecting to be able to use it on 3g somehow, hopefully this summer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To simplistic
reviews.comment: Please fix app so I can actually manage the router and not just look at information. I want to manage Mac filtering,  Wi-Fi channel, and parental controls.
reviews.author: Chris Zwygart

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Everything but the wifi settings and the guest network access settings works, they just tell me \"router not found\" and to make sure I\'m within range of the router.  Linksys E4200v2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Hardly ever works and keeps telling me my password is wrong fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More features
reviews.comment: I would like to see what each device is currently connected to and what web address they are currently listening to ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as expected
reviews.comment: Very decent app. Nice looking, allows you to easily check for updates and reboot your router as well as managing connected devices. Probably more customization options would be nice.
reviews.author: Alex Gourenko

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its pretty cool my phone needs the guest access it wont let me on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited
reviews.comment: Other people are right--you can\'t do much with this app. I never really liked Cisco Connect to begin with because it isn\'t very advanced, and this is even less advanced than the desktop version. For starters, parental controls is a must and viewing the channel is absolutely necessary as well. Until our suggestions are added, I am uninstalling this useless app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Handy App
reviews.comment: If you don\'t want to have to go to your computer every time you want to monitor your router or it\'s devices or change a connected device or connect a new device, then this app is for you!!!.  Saves many trips back and forth.  You cannot do major reconfigurations, but you can add, delete or modify device connections, reset the router, enable Wifi Protected mode, etc.  If you never pay any attention to your router or it\'s status or never add new devices, then this might not be worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Navigation problems
reviews.comment: Can\'t see everything using my Galaxy Y. Unable to scroll down. Please fix. Thanks!
reviews.author: Invictus Pascual dela Cruz
